mapper.select: SELECT b.* ,f.no file_no ,f.file_name ,f.file_path ,f.file_code FROM board b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM file WHERE parent_table = "board" AND file_code = 1 ) f ON (b.no = f.parent_no) ORDER BY b.reg_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( title, writer, content) VALUES ( #{title}, #{writer}, #{content} )
